alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 24 at 4:35PM EDT until August 24 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for... South Central Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 335 PM CDT, Heavy thunderstorms located over the Pensacola area remain nearly stationary producing torrential rainfall rates this aftenoon. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pensacola, Ferry Pass, Brent, West Pensacola, Ensley, Warrington, Goulding, Myrtle Grove, Perdido Beach, Avondale, Ramsey Beach, Millview, Bellview, Beach Haven, Pleasant Grove, Brownsville, Pine Forest, Paradise Beach, Perdido Heights and Quinavista. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
